pages.name: Hydra
pages.text: $(#734608)A $(thing)hydra$()$(#734608) is a limb-less beast with many heads that spew streams of poison

$(#734608)Hydras reside in hydra lairs within swamps$(br2)They can have up to 9 heads that attack everything in sight, even other hydras. Each is capable of firing jets of poison at their target and biting with an even stronger venom$(br2)To support its already incredible strength, its regenerative abilities allow it to regrow its heads in a matter of seconds

$(#734608)Should one of its heads be cut off, two more heads will replace it $(o)$(#f7430c)unless it is lit on fire$()$(#734608) where it becomes unable to regenerate itself$(br2)When the hydra's final head is severed, it will drop $(item)hydra fangs$()$(#734608), $(item)rotten flesh$()$(#734608), and rarely a $(item)hydra heart$()$(#734608) and hydra skull$(br2)The $(item)$(t:Only grants regeneration while in the user's hotbar)hydra heart$()$(#734608) is a powerful item that grants the user regeneration over time
$(#734608)Hydra fangs can be used to craft $(item)hydra arrows$()$(#734608) which are able to poison and leech life from targets
